ongoingEvents.title: FACILITIES TEAM NEEDS YOU!
ongoingEvents.description: There are a number of small fixes and tweaks that are in need of attention around our building and grounds. If you’re interested in helping out - even if your handy skill level is low - please volunteer. Email fred.walker@yale.edu to help out.

ongoingEvents.title: A GLIMPSE INTO THE FALL SCHEDULE
ongoingEvents.description:
• Full Sunday Schedule resumes - 9/8/24
  • Prayer @8:30, Children’s and Adult Sunday Studies @9:30, Weekly Fellowship Lunches after worship
  • Life Groups & Discipleship Groups resume regular schedule
  • Welcome Sunday (Lunch and Kids Crafts outdoors) - 9/8/24
  • Congregational Meeting, discussing Annual Ministry Plan - 9/15/24
  • Ministry Fair - 9/22/24
  • Women’s Welcome Brunch - 10/5/24
  • Young Adults BBQ Hangout - 10/19/24
